content.rendered: Azadeh Razani chairs Mannheimer Swartling’s Insurance practice group and is also a member of Mannheimer Swartling’s Dispute Resolution practice group. She is based in the firm’s office in Stockholm and advises clients in all stages of a dispute – from the early case assessments and claim letters to settlement negotiations and proceedings before Swedish courts and Swedish and international arbitral tribunals. She regularly represents clients in various types of insurance-related disputes. Azadeh joined the firm in 2007 and is a member of the Swedish Bar Association. She has an LL.M. degree from the University of Stockholm.
